effect.lne_wizards.arcane_precision.desc: Increasing the Crit Chance & Damage on Arcane Spells the target.
effect.lne_wizards.flame_rush.descriptio: Increases movement speed and fire spell power.
effect.lne_wizards.zephyrs_speed.descrip: Increasing the Crit Chance & Movement Speed of the caster.
spell.lne_wizards.arcane_precision.descr: On spell critical hit: The target is more vulnerable to Arcane Spell Damage & Crits for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.lne_wizards.arcane_precision.name: Arcane Precision
spell.lne_wizards.arcane_starfall.descri: Calls a falling astral star, causing {damage} arcane spell damage. Consumes all Arcane Charges.
spell.lne_wizards.arcane_starfall.name: Falling Star
spell.lne_wizards.fire_flamerush.descrip: Rushes forward and leaves flame clouds on the trail. Increasing movement speed & fire spell power for {effect_duration}.
spell.lne_wizards.fire_flamerush.name: Flamerush
spell.lne_wizards.frost_ray.description: Casts a cold beam, causing {damage} frost spell damage and slowing the target.
spell.lne_wizards.frost_ray.name: Ray of Frost
spell.lne_wizards.obsidian_shards.descri: On spell hit: {trigger_chance} chance to spawn 8 piercing obsidian shards dealing {damage}.
spell.lne_wizards.obsidian_shards.name: Obsidian Shards
spell.lne_wizards.pyromaniac.description: On spell hitting burning targets: {trigger_chance} chance to reduce cooldowns of fire spells and deal additional {damage} damage.
spell.lne_wizards.pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
spell.lne_wizards.rimefrost.description: On spell hit: {trigger_chance} chance to create a freezing area inflicting freezing ticks.
spell.lne_wizards.rimefrost.name: Rimefrost
spell.lne_wizards.water_flow.description: On spell cast: {trigger_chance} chance to damage enemies for {damage} and healing allies for {heal} hearts around the caster.
spell.lne_wizards.water_flow.name: Flow like Water
spell.lne_wizards.zephyrs_speed.descript: On spell hit: {trigger_chance} chance to increase spell crit chance and movement speed for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.lne_wizards.zephyrs_speed.name: Zephyrs Speed
